name: Go All the Way to the Top!!
effect: [Main] You may rest 3 of your DON!! cards: If you have any DON!! cards given, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 4000 base power or less and up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 3000 base power or less. [Counter] Your Leader gains +3000 power during this battle.
